DESCRIPTION: Add a zero cost strike card to your hand that exhausts. You can only gain strikes from one source each turn.
The next attack you play this turn heals you for the amount of damage done, and is Exhausted.
Reduces incoming damage. Celerity cards consume for effect.
A colorless attack card that is retained.
Increases Strength next turn. Potence cards consume for effect.
An attack that consumes a maneuver to deal additional damage and reduce thorns.
